name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. J. Dennis SHEEDY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Sheedy
docket_number: No. 860, Disciplinary Docket No. 2; No. 60 DB 92—Disciplinary Board

parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. J. Dennis SHEEDY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 30th day of June, 1993, upon consideration of Recommendation of Disciplinary Board Member, the Order of this Court entered on June 19, 1992 pursuant to Pa.R.D.E. 208(f)(4) is dissolved, and Respondent is reinstated to the practice of law. Respondent is directed to pay costs to the Disciplinary Board pursuant to Rule 208(g), Pa.R.D.E.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
627 A.2d 1185
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. J. Dennis SHEEDY, Respondent.
No. 860, Disciplinary Docket No. 2.
No. 60 DB 92—Disciplinary Board.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 30, 1993.
